source: REFRESH TABLE odw_curated_db.service_user
Test 1: Make sure we have no more than one Applicant per case

SELECT
    caseReference
    ,count(*)
FROM
    odw_curated_db.service_user
WHERE
    serviceUserType = 'Applicant'
GROUP BY
    caseReference
HAVING
    count(*) > 1
ORDER BY
    2 desc
Test 2: Make sure that nsip representation has linked up correctly - example of increase in number of records

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation
WHERE
    caseRef = 'BC010028'
    AND isActive = 'Y'

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_curated_db.service_user
WHERE
    caseReference = 'BC010028'

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI
WHERE
    ServiceUserID IN (126571, 126572)
REFRESH TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_representation

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation
WHERE
    caseRef = 'BC010028'

SELECT
   SourceSystemUID
   ,COUNT(DISTINCT ServiceUserID)
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI
GROUP BY
    SourceSystemUID
ORDER BY
    2 DESC
Example 2: Example of situation that records could be reduced
REFRESH TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_representation
SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI where SourceSystemUID = 30530

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation
WHERE
    caseRef = 'EN010080'and referenceId = 'EN010080-28475'
    AND isActive = 'Y'
ORDER BY representedId
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.nsip_representation WHERE caseRef = 'EN010080'and referenceId = 'EN010080-28475'
SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user where id in (SELECT representativeId FROM odw_curated_db.nsip_representation WHERE referenceId = 'EN010080-28475')
Example 3:

SELECT
   SourceSystemUID
   ,COUNT(DISTINCT ServiceUserID)
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI
GROUP BY
    SourceSystemUID
ORDER BY
    2 DESC
SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI where SourceSystemUID = 33200

SELECT 
    reps.* 
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    SourceSystemUID = 33200
order by representedID, redactedNotes

SELECT 
    * 
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user as Users
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON users.id = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    SourceSystemUID = 33200

Here's 3 NSIP cases covering a spread of rep volumes.  
 
TR050006	870
EN010008	261
TR030001	80
First: TR05006
REFRESH TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_representation

SELECT 
    COUNT(*)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
WHERE
    CaseRef = 'TR050006'

SELECT DISTINCT
    reps.* 
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    CaseReference = 'TR050006'
order by representedID, redactedNotes

SELECT 
    representedId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT referenceId)
FROM
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    CaseReference = 'TR050006'
GROUP BY
    representedId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT referenceId) > 1
ORDER BY 2 desc

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation 
WHERE
    representedId = 155020
    AND CaseRef = 'TR050006'

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation 
WHERE
    referenceId IN ('TR050006-29436', 'TR050006-29439')
SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_uri WHERE SourceSystemUID IN (31500, 31497)
select * from odw_curated_db.service_user where ID IN (154664,155020)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user
WHERE
    ID = 155020

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation 
WHERE
    representedId = 154660
    AND CaseRef = 'TR050006'

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation 
WHERE
    referenceId IN ('TR050006-28106', 'TR050006-28135')

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user
WHERE
    ID = 154660

SELECT 
   * 
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user as users
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON users.Id = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    URI.CaseReference = 'TR050006'
order by users.Id

SELECT 
   * 
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user as users
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON users.Id = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    URI.CaseReference = 'TR050006'
order by users.Id

SELECT 
    referenceId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representedId)
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representativeId)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    CaseReference = 'TR050006'
GROUP BY referenceId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT representedId) > 1
    OR COUNT(DISTINCT representativeId) > 1

SELECT 
   * 
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    reps.ReferenceId = 'TR050006-27994'

   users.Id IN (154659, 155151)

order by representedID, redactedNotes

    ,COUNT(DISTINCT referenceId)
FROM
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps

WHERE

HAVING

ORDER BY 2 desc

FROM

GROUP BY referenceId
HAVING

    OR COUNT(DISTINCT representativeId) > 1

WHERE

SELECT

FROM

WHERE

Case: TR030001

SELECT DISTINCT 
    reps.* 
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    CaseReference = 'TR030001'
order by representedID, redactedNotes

SELECT
    *
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation 
WHERE
    referenceId IN ('TR030001-4768', 'TR030001-4766')

SELECT 
    referenceId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representedId)
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representativeId)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    CaseReference = 'TR030001'
GROUP BY referenceId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT representedId) > 1
    OR COUNT(DISTINCT representativeId) > 1
Test across cases

SELECT 
    representedId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT CaseReference)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
        OR reps.representativeId = URI.ServiceUserID
GROUP BY 
    representedId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT CaseReference) > 1
Need to work out the total impact of the dupes across cases for representations

SELECT 
    *
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    ServiceUserType = 'RepresentationContact'
    AND referenceId IN ('TR030001-4768', 'TR030001-4766')

SELECT
    count(DISTINCT caseRef)
    ,count(DISTINCT referenceId)
FROM (

SELECT -- we have matched the inbound data to more than one service user record and so must have more than one rep
    reps.caseRef
    ,reps.referenceId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representedId)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    ServiceUserType = 'RepresentationContact'
GROUP BY
    reps.caseRef
    ,reps.referenceId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT representedID) > 1)
select count(distinct caseRef)
,count(DISTINCT referenceId) from odw_curated_db.nsip_representation

SELECT
    NumberRepresentations
    ,COUNT(caseRef) as NumberOfCases
FROM
(SELECT
    caseRef
    ,count(DISTINCT referenceId) 
FROM (

SELECT -- we have matched the inbound data to more than one service user record and so must have more than one rep
    reps.caseRef
    ,reps.referenceId
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT representedId)
FROM 
    odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
        ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
WHERE
    ServiceUserType = 'RepresentationContact'
GROUP BY
    reps.caseRef
    ,reps.referenceId
HAVING
    COUNT(DISTINCT representedID) > 1)
GROUP BY
    caseRef)
GROUP by
    NumberRepresentations

SELECT
    PercentageDupes
    ,COUNT(DISTINCT caseRef) AS NumberOfCases
FROM (
SELECT
    FullCount.caseRef
    ,((COALESCE(TotalDupes, 0.0)*1.0)/(TotalRepresentations*1.0))*100 AS PercentageDupes

FROM
    (
        SELECT
            caseRef
            ,count(DISTINCT referenceId) as TotalDupes
        FROM
        (

            SELECT -- we have matched the inbound data to more than one service user record and so must have more than one rep
                reps.caseRef
                ,reps.referenceId
                ,COUNT(DISTINCT representedId)
            FROM 
                odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
                INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user_URI AS URI
                    ON reps.representedId = URI.ServiceUserID
            WHERE
                ServiceUserType = 'RepresentationContact'
            GROUP BY
                reps.caseRef
                ,reps.referenceId
            HAVING
                COUNT(DISTINCT representedID) > 1) 
        GROUP BY
            caseRef
    ) AS dupes  
    FULL OUTER JOIN 
    (
        SELECT
            reps.caseRef
            ,COUNT(referenceId) AS TotalRepresentations
        FROM 
            odw_curated_db.nsip_representation as reps
        GROUP BY
            reps.caseRef
    )AS FullCount
        ON dupes.caseRef = FullCount.caseRef
)
GROUP BY
    PercentageDupes
